name: portfolio
description: A modern, interactive portfolio web app for Francis Mule, Software Engineer.

scripts.build: parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ && cp src/robots.txt dist/robots.txt && cp src/offline.html dist/offline.html
scripts.build:obfuscated: parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ --no-source-maps && javascript-obfuscator dist/*.js --output dist --options-preset high-obfuscation && cp src/robots.txt dist/robots.txt && cp src/offline.html dist/offline.html
scripts.build:with-images: pnpm run optimize-images && pnpm run build
scripts.build:obfuscated:with-images: pnpm run optimize-images && pnpm run build:obfuscated
